content.question: The development described in the excerpt represented which part of the journey undertaken by enslaved people in the transatlantic slave trade?

choices.label: The Middle Passage across the Atlantic Ocean
The domestic trade in the Americas to distant locations
The march from interior African states to the Atlantic coast

content.answer: The march from interior African states to the Atlantic coast

topic.text: 2.3: Capture and the Impact of the Slave Trade on West African Societies

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
